name: aws-lambda-konexio
description: Le code source AWS Lambda et Airtable Sripts de Konexio.

scripts.layer-zip: mkdir nodejs && npm prune --production && cp -R node_modules/ nodejs/ && cp package.json nodejs/package.json && cp package-lock.json nodejs/package-lock.json && npm install --only=dev && lambda-zip layer.lambda-zip layer.zip -a -v
scripts.layer-zip-update: npm run layer-zip && npm run layer-update
scripts.function-zip-update: npm run function-zip && npm run function-update

author: Johann Hospice
